== Installing Babylon in Linux ==

By: '''<nowiki>[[OmidAlemi|Omid Alemi]]</nowiki>'''

omid.alemi@gmail.com

 '''''' <<BR>>

[Persian Version http://wiki.ubuntu.ir/BabylonForLinux]

=== Abstract ===
This guide is for installing Babylon 6 in Linux.

Before installing Babylon , first we should install Internet Explorer 6 via IEs4Linux.

=== Setting Wine ===
Run these commands in terminal:

<pre>
$ export WINEPREFIX="/home/omid/.ies4linux/ie6"
$ winecfg
</pre>

Note that you should type your home dir instead of /home/omid.

In Wine Configuration set the Windows Version to Windows XP

=== Installing Babylon ===
Run these commands in Babylon installation dir :

<pre>
$ export WINEPREFIX="/home/omid/.ies4linux/ie6"
$ wine Setup.exe
</pre>

Follow the installation instruction . Babylon will run in your notification area.
